Trump and his supporters want the freedom to do what Singapore already has the freedom to do - give its own citizens """"priority"""", discriminate against permanent residents and foreigners in education, housing, medical care, scholarships, jobs, etc. My favorite """"line"""": """"Treating permanent residents and foreigners equally with Singaporeans is discrimination against Singaporeans!!"""" Even undocumented immigrants in American have more rights than legal foreign residents in Singapore - such as access to public schooling. How can we begrudge America for wishing to emulate Singapore's policies towards its permanent residents and legal foreign residents, not to mention undocumented immigrants and refugees? Can you imagine if Singapore and the US ever treated each other tit for tat - you hire one of ours and we'll hire one of your; you allow one of ours into your schools and we'll allow one of yours into our schools, you give one of ours a scholarship and we'll give one of yours a scholarship, etc.?
